backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access‑controlled user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a CSS background-size update affecting frontend/src/index.css.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files detailing components, hooks, styles, and PWA behavior.

frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a fallback recovery UI for React mount timeouts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, cache cleanup, and push notifications with versioned static and background assets.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script to detect build-breaking issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node verification script checking TS config presence, NodeJS.Timeout misuse, background asset paths, and service worker configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, playback state, service worker handling, and global error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button allowing users to start or stop casting the audio stream and tracking cast events.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA installation prompt logic detecting platform/browser conditions and showing install or guide modals.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Displays a fixed bottom tab bar with three tabs and handles tab switching.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact audio player with artwork, title marquee, and play/pause controls.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Implements an auto-scrolling marquee for long track titles with motion preferences and interaction pausing.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a slider to control and sync audio element volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and displaying status of web push notifications with subscription handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Modal form for submitting song or shout‑out requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset when service worker errors or updates occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with fallback modal and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays a show card with image, description, genres, and schedule, clickable for details.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red animated LIVE badge with a radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Renders a small pulsing dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Renders a styled track notification with icons and colors based on type and supports dismissing.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Contains the Show interface and a mock list of show data used for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles auto-resuming audio playback on visibility, focus, and page restore events, notifying when manual resume is needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: React hook managing Chromecast availability, initialization, sessions, and casting state for a given stream URL. Handles API readiness, session events, and connection/casting error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Simple hook that stores and toggles a boolean favorite flag in localStorage. Initializes state from storage and updates it on toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing ICP Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client lifecycle. Exposes login, logout, status flags, and the resolved identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Computes overflow, animation distance, duration, and remount keys for scrolling marquee text based on container and text measurements. Uses layout effects and retries to ensure accurate DOM sizing.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Tracks now‑playing metadata to detect track, mix, or live transitions and triggers deduplicated browser notifications. Manages notification permission, throttling, and current notification state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Manages push subscription state using a service worker and backend actor, handling permission requests, new or existing subscriptions, and unsubscribe operations. Stores subscription data in the backend after successful registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching stream URLs, checking availability, now-playing data, and submitting requests with fallbacks and retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset logic, and related state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses audio and exposes controls to start or cancel it.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles requesting and releasing the screen wake lock based on activity and visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, background images, layout resets, and global styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a shows browsing UI with genre/day filters and a list of selectable show cards.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Displays the main live radio screen with station branding, playback controls, and status indicators such as on‑air, loading, and errors.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Shows detailed now‑playing info including album art, track metadata, playback controls, volume, share options, and a sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Provides settings for notifications and background image refresh, including cache clearing and service worker interaction.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Renders detailed information for a selected show with genres, schedule, description, and calendar/reminder actions.
Captures early startup errors, classifies critical issues, and displays a recovery overlay when thresholds are met.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility helpers for safe Google Analytics event tracking, including play, pause, and casting events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a show by computing next show time, formatting dates, and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs by handling relative, protocol-relative, and absolute paths while enforcing HTTPS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with support for hash routing and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, screens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, versions, and feature requests related to adjusting global CSS background-size behavior.
